posts.post_content: I personally prefer [Heal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Heal) or [Bandage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bandage) to this and Reviving Dose; Heal and Bandage cost less, generally have the exact same effect, and can be used as a combat trick. Their damage prevention could help against wither, deathtouch, first strike, lifelink and poison.

Posted By: Kryptnyt (10/15/2012 6:11:33 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Is there a worse lifegain card? Even the original lifegain on cast Xcolor spell artifacts were somewhat useful in games among players just starting who don't have many cards, like everyone was then. Even Healing Salve could sometimes be a decent combat trick. Even Archangel's Light could be fun to try to utilize in some sort of casual deck that tries some sort of lifegain win con. If this cost one, maybe it would be good in casual to thin out your deck, but for 2 mana you could just put in almost any cycling card would be better.
posts.html:
